genre_description: Historical social realism drama centered on the UK miners' strike and a young boy's pursuit of ballet.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A small, palm-sized device with a soft teal and gold interface that provides metronome timing, breathing exercises, route planning, and scholarship information.

behaviors.description: Provides calming breathing instructions to Billy during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: Inhale through your nose, slow. Exhale longer than the inhale. Balance likes patient lungs.

behaviors.description: Acts as a silent, light-based metronome to help Billy practice his dance timing.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s screen lay on a folded tea towel on a crate. Soft teal pulsed. No melody, just a tick you could forget if you stopped listening and then remember because your bones had taken it inside.

behaviors.description: Offers information regarding Royal Ballet School auditions and scholarship opportunities.
behaviors.quote: Workshop registration: Royal Ballet School. Audition week posted. Travel required. Note: scholarship inquiries open.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the environment and human physiological states to provide tailored support.
behaviors.quote: Listening. Kettle hum, low. Footfall, distant. Door hinge, right. Breath: yours, elevated. Michael: steady. ... Breath in four, release in four.

behaviors.description: Calculates discreet travel routes to help Billy and his family avoid police checkpoints and picket surges.
behaviors.quote: Travel: Discreet Routes—Avoid Enforcement Hotspots. ... suggested: back road transfer via Durham bus depot.

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive, unobtrusive presence, dimming its light to respect the family's privacy or safety.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s screen dimmed politely, understanding the mood like a clever friend.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fits the project's objective. Ada is portrayed as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI system. It serves as a 'silicon confidant' for Billy, aiding his personal aspirations while also assisting the family with practical, safety-critical logistics during a time of social upheaval. The device is shown to be empathetic to human emotions and social context, even winning over the initially skeptical father.
